alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:02PM CDT until August 07 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southeastern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/. * At 702 PM CDT/602 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Swan Lake, or 10 miles northeast of Arthur, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arthur, Swan Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Flatts, Cogill Lake, Calora, Green Lake, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Three Mile Lake, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail and Schnick Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 124 and 136. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 193. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
